summary: Defines a suite of unit tests for the Kandinsky image‑to‑image combined pipeline, covering dummy component setup, input generation, output format equivalence, half‑precision inference, batch‑vs‑single processing consistency, resource offloading, and optional component save/load functionality.
business_intent: Validate the correctness, efficiency, and robustness of the Kandinsky image generation pipeline to ensure reliable deployment and quick detection of regressions in core features and resource handling.
